types.description: Whisky or whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash. Various grains (which may be malted) are used for different varieties, including barley, corn, rye, and wheat. Whisky is typically aged in wooden casks, generally made of charred white oak.

subtypes.description: Scotch whisky is malt whisky or grain whisky made in Scotland. Scotch whisky must be made in a manner specified by law. All Scotch whisky was originally made from malted barley. Commercial distilleries began introducing whisky made from wheat and rye in the late 18th century.

products.name: Buchanans Pineapple
products.description: Buchanan's Pineapple is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is a whisky of uncommon depth and balance, with a smooth, rich flavor.

products.name: Buchanans 12
products.description: Buchanan's 12-year-old Scotch whisky is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is one of the most iconic and awarded Scotch whisky brands in the world. It has a soft and fruity flavor, with orange and chocolate notes that allow it to be served on the rocks or neat.

products.name: Buchanans Master
products.description: Buchanan's Master is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is a whisky of uncommon depth and balance, with a smooth, rich flavor.

products.name: Buchanans 15
products.description: Buchanan's 15-year-old Scotch whisky is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is a whisky of uncommon depth and balance, with a smooth, rich flavor.

products.name: Buchanans 18
products.description: Buchanan's 18-year-old Scotch whisky is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is a whisky of uncommon depth and balance, with a smooth, rich flavor.

products.name: Buchanans Red Seal
products.description: Buchanan's Red Seal is a blend of Scotland's finest single malt whiskies. It is a whisky of uncommon depth and balance, with a smooth, rich flavor.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Red Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Red Label is the world's best-selling Scotch Whisky. It's renowned for its bold, characterful taste – balanced to shine through even when mixed. It's a flavor the Walker family has never compromised on.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Black Label is a true icon, recognized as the benchmark for all other deluxe blends. Created using only whiskies aged for a minimum of 12 years from the four corners of Scotland, Johnnie Walker Black Label has an unmistakably smooth, deep, complex character.

products.name: Johnnie Walker High Rye
products.description: Johnnie Walker High Rye is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Double Black
products.description: Johnnie Walker Double Black is inspired by the iconic flavors of Johnnie Walker Black Label and turns them up to create a blend of unprecedented intensity. Strongly influenced by powerful West Coast and Island whiskies – it's an impressive choice and ideal for exploring deeper, more intense flavors.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Swing
products.description: Johnnie Walker Swing is a luxurious and smooth whisky with a variety of tastes and textures. It is a blend of up to 35 of the finest aged single malts and grain whiskies. It is a blend of up to 35 of the finest aged single malts and grain whiskies.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Green Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Green Label is back, and this time it's here to stay. Crafted from a palette of Speyside, Highland, Lowland, and Island malts and matured for at least 15 years, it delivers all the character of a single malt whisky, but with a greater depth of flavor.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Gold Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve is known for its creamy smoothness. It opens with a luxurious burst of delicate nectar and gentle smokiness that develops into sweet fruits and deeper, velvety, honeyed tones before giving way to sublime, lingering whispers of smoke and oakiness in the finish.

products.name: Johnnie Walker 18 Year
products.description: Johnnie Walker 18 Year Old is a mellow, complex Scotch. It marries up to 18 different whiskies, each chosen for their remarkable depth of flavor and character. The result is a deep, rich, and complex balance of flavors.

products.name: Johnnie Walker Blue Label
products.description: Johnnie Walker Blue Label is an unrivaled masterpiece. It is an exquisite blend made from some of Scotland's rarest and most exceptional Scotch whiskies. Only one in every ten thousand casks has the elusive quality, character, and flavor to deliver the remarkable signature taste of Johnnie Walker Blue Label.

products.name: Johnnie Walker King George V
products.description: Johnnie Walker King George V is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Chivas Regal 12
products.description: Chivas Regal 12 is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Chivas Regal 13
products.description: Chivas Regal 13 is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 13 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Chivas Regal 18
products.description: Chivas Regal 18 is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 18 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Old Parr 12
products.description: Old Parr 12 is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Old Parr 18
products.description: Old Parr 18 is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 18 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Macallan 12 Double Cask
products.description: The Macallan Double Cask 12 Years Old forms part of our Double Cask range which marries the classic Macallan style and the unmistakable sweetness of American oak. This is a fully rounded single malt in perfect balance, with flavors of honey, citrus, and ginger.

products.name: Macallan 12 Sherry Oak
products.description: The Macallan Sherry Oak 12 Years Old forms part of our Sherry Oak range which features a series of single malt whiskies matured exclusively in hand-picked sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez for richness and complexity. A matured character, the 12 Years Old delivers rich wood spice and dried fruits and a natural rich gold color.

products.name: Macallan 15 Double Cask
products.description: The Macallan Double Cask 15 Years Old forms part of our Double Cask range which marries the classic Macallan style and the unmistakable sweetness of American oak. This is a fully rounded single malt in perfect balance, with flavors of honey, citrus, and ginger.

products.name: Macallan 18 Sherry Oak
products.description: The Macallan Sherry Oak 18 Years Old forms part of our Sherry Oak range which features a series of single malt whiskies matured exclusively in hand-picked sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez for richness and complexity. A matured character, the 18 Years Old delivers rich wood spice and dried fruits and a natural rich gold color.

products.name: Macallan Rare Cask
products.description: The Macallan Rare Cask is crafted from the finest and rarest sherry seasoned oak casks, unearthed by The Macallan Whisky Mastery Team using their knowledge, skill, passion, and creativity. The result is a whisky of rich mahogany red color, with rich intense flavors of vanilla, raisin, and chocolate.

products.name: Macallan A Night On Earth
products.description: The Macallan A Night On Earth is a limited edition single malt whisky that celebrates the beauty of the night sky. It is a rich and complex whisky with flavors of dried fruits, ginger, and cinnamon.

products.name: Macallan The Harmony Collection Amber Meadow
products.description: The Macallan The Harmony Collection Amber Meadow is a limited edition single malt whisky that celebrates the beauty of the night sky. It is a rich and complex whisky with flavors of dried fruits, ginger, and cinnamon.

products.name: Macallan The Harmony Collection Intense Arabica
products.description: The Macallan The Harmony Collection Intense Arabica is a limited edition single malt whisky that celebrates the beauty of the night sky. It is a rich and complex whisky with flavors of dried fruits, ginger, and cinnamon.

products.name: Macallan The Harmony Collection Rich Cacao
products.description: The Macallan The Harmony Collection Rich Cacao is a limited edition single malt whisky that celebrates the beauty of the night sky. It is a rich and complex whisky with flavors of dried fruits, ginger, and cinnamon.

subtypes.description: Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey, a barrel-aged distilled spirit made primarily from corn. The name ultimately derives from the French Bourbon dynasty, although the precise inspiration for the whiskey's name is uncertain; contenders include Bourbon County in Kentucky and Bourbon Street in New Orleans, both of which are named after the dynasty.

products.name: Jack Daniels Black
products.description: Jack Daniel's Black Label offers gentle aromas of caramel, vanilla, and butterscotch. A hint of wood is apparent and toffee notes begin to appear in the glass as it opens up. The palate is smooth with flavors of caramel, vanilla, and a hint of chocolate. The finish is long and lingering with a hint of spice.

products.name: Jack Daniels Honey
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey is a blend of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey and a unique honey liqueur of our own making, for a taste that's one-of-a-kind and unmistakably Jack. With hints of honey and a finish that's naturally smooth, Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey offers a taste of the unexpected.

products.name: Jack Daniels Fire
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Fire delivers a rich, complex and multi-dimensional tasting experience. Jack Daniel's Tennessee Fire is crafted with Jack Daniel's Old No. 7 Tennessee Whiskey and naturally infused with a proprietary red hot cinnamon liqueur. The result is a sweet, hot cinnamon kick that complements the smooth and delicious taste of Jack Daniel's, giving you a unique finish full of unmistakable character.

products.name: Jack Daniels Apple
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Apple has the unique character of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey, the crisp taste of green apple and a rewarding finish; it's been described by our master distiller as being 'like freshly picked apple in a glass of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey'.

products.name: Jack Daniels Triple Mash
products.description: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Triple Mash is a limited edition, higher proof release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using the same mash bill as Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, but is triple distilled, giving it a higher proof and a slightly different flavor profile.

products.name: Jack Daniels Bonded
products.description: Jack Daniel's Bottled in Bond is a special release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using the same mash bill as Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, but is bottled at 100 proof and aged for at least four years.

products.name: Jack Daniels Single Barrel Rye
products.description: Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Rye is a limited release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using a mash bill of 70% rye, 18% corn, and 12% malted barley, and is aged in new, charred oak barrels.

products.name: Jack Daniels Single Barrel Select
products.description: Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Select is a special release from the Jack Daniel Distillery. This whiskey is made using the same mash bill as Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, but is aged in new, charred oak barrels and bottled at a higher proof.

products.name: Kentucky Owl Bourbon Batch
products.description: Kentucky Owl Bourbon Batch is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Kentucky Owl Rye Batch
products.description: Kentucky Owl Rye Batch is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Kentucky Owl Takumi
products.description: Kentucky Owl Takumi is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Kentucky Owl Maighstir
products.description: Kentucky Owl Maighstir is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.description: Kentucky Owl St Patrick's is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.description: Kentucky Owl Confiscated is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.description: Colonel E.H. Taylor Small Batch is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.description: Colonel E.H. Taylor Barrel Proof is a blend of many different malt and grain Bourbon whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

subtypes.description: Irish whiskey is whiskey made on the island of Ireland. The word 'whiskey' is an Anglicisation of the first word in the Gaelic phrase, uisce beatha, meaning 'water of life'.

products.name: Jameson
products.description: Jameson is a blended Irish whiskey produced by the Irish Distillers subsidiary of Pernod Ricard. The John Jameson and Son Irish Whiskey company was formally established in 1810 when John Jameson and his son (also John Jameson) took ownership of the Bow Street Distillery in Dublin which had originally been built by his wife's cousins the Steins in 1780.

products.name: Jameson Black Barrel
products.description: Jameson Black Barrel is a tribute to the cooper's method of charring barrels. Charring is an age-old method for invigorating barrels to intensify the taste. Jameson Black Barrel is our tribute to our coopers, who painstakingly give their bourbon barrels an additional charring to reveal their untold richness and complexity.

products.name: Jameson Orange
products.description: Jameson Orange is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

products.name: Jameson Cask Mates
products.description: Jameson Caskmates is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend combines style with substance and tradition.

subtypes.description: Japanese whisky is a style of whisky developed and produced in Japan. Whisky production in Japan began around 1870, but the first commercial production was in 1924 upon the opening of the country's first distillery, Yamazaki.

products.name: Suntory Toki
products.description: Suntory Toki is a blended Japanese whisky produced by the Suntory company. It is a blend of selected malt and grain whiskies from the Hakushu, Yamazaki, and Chita distilleries.

products.name: Suntory Hibiki
products.description: Hibiki is a brand of blended Japanese whisky produced by the Suntory company. It is a blend of selected malt and grain whiskies from the Yamazaki, Hakushu, and Chita distilleries.

types.description: Tequila is a distilled beverage made from the blue agave plant, primarily in the area surrounding the city of Tequila, 65 km (40 mi) northwest of Guadalajara, and in the Jaliscan Highlands of the central western Mexican state of Jalisco.

subtypes.description: Tequila is a distilled beverage made from the blue agave plant, primarily in the area surrounding the city of Tequila, 65 km (40 mi) northwest of Guadalajara, and in the Jaliscan Highlands of the central western Mexican state of Jalisco.

products.name: Jose Cuervo Gold Especial
products.description: Jose Cuervo Gold is a blend of reposado and younger tequilas. It is a blend of reposado and younger tequilas. It is a blend of reposado and younger tequilas.

products.name: Jose Cuervo Silver
products.description: Jose Cuervo Silver is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.name: Jose Cuervo Reserva de la Familia
products.description: Jose Cuervo Reserva de la Familia is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.name: Maestro Dobel Diamante
products.description: Maestro Dobel is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.name: Maestro Dobel Silver
products.description: Maestro Dobel is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.description: Maestro Dobel is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.name: Maestro Dobel Anejo
products.description: Maestro Dobel is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.name: Maestro Dobel Humito
products.description: Maestro Dobel is a brand of tequila produced by the Jose Cuervo company. It is a blend of reposado, añejo and extra añejo tequilas.

products.name: Patron Blanco
products.description: Patrón Tequila Blanco is a crystal clear, pure ultra premium tequila. This light. fresh tequila is a favorite of tequila connoisseurs worldwide. Many prefer this smooth, soft and light tequila over an aged and slightly oaky flavor. Patron Tequila is a favorite of many celebrities.

products.name: Patron Reposado
products.description: Patrón Reposado is a nice switch for current tequila drinkers who want a bit more complexity and smoothness of taste. Aged in oak barrels for over two months, it blends the fresh, clean taste of Patrón Silver with the oaky flavor of Patrón Añejo. The balance of fresh agave and oak wood with subtle fruit, citrus and honey notes makes it an excellent sipping tequila or for a premium cocktail.

products.name: Patron Anejo
products.description: Patrón Añejo is a delicate blend of uniquely aged tequilas, all aged in small white oak barrels for a minimum of 12 months. Similar to winemaking, each vintage of Patrón Añejo is carefully blended to produce a smooth and sweet tasting tequila. It's distinct oakwood flavor complemented by vanilla, raisins, and honey with a caramel and smoky finish makes it perfect for sipping.

products.name: Patron XO Cafe
products.description: Patrón XO Cafe is an extraordinary blend of ultra premium tequila and the natural essences of the finest coffee. Unlike most coffee liqueurs, the taste is more dry than sweet. The higher proof brings out the flavor of the pure coffee essence and the ultra premium tequila. It is excellent for sipping as well as a premium ingredient in a cocktail.

products.name: Gran Patron Platinum
products.description: Gran Patrón Platinum is made from the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave, is triple distilled and then rested in oak tanks for 30 days. It's presented in a hand-numbered crystal bottle and elegant case.

products.name: Don Julio Blanco
products.description: Don Julio Blanco is a high-quality white tequila bottled immediately after distillation to maintain as much of the fresh agave flavor as possible.

products.name: Don Julio Reposado
products.description: Don Julio Reposado is a high-quality white tequila bottled immediately after distillation to maintain as much of the fresh agave flavor as possible.

products.name: 1800 Blanco
products.description: 1800 Tequila blanco is 100% Agave and has an exceptionally clean finish.

products.name: 1800 Reposado
products.description: 1800 Tequila Reposado is 100% Agave and has been aged in American and French Oak barrels for up to six months.

products.name: 1800 Anejo
products.description: 1800 Tequila Anejo is 100% Agave and has been aged in American and French Oak barrels for up to three years.

products.name: 1800 Coconut
products.description: 1800 Tequila Coconut is a unique blend of 1800 Silver Tequila and the natural, refreshing flavor of coconut. The perfect balance of sweet and citrus, it's good enough to drink on the rocks or mixed with pineapple juice and a wedge of lime.

products.name: 1800 Cristalino
products.description: 1800 Tequila Cristalino is a unique blend of 1800 Silver Tequila and the natural, refreshing flavor of coconut. The perfect balance of sweet and citrus, it's good enough to drink on the rocks or mixed with pineapple juice and a wedge of lime.

products.name: Clase Azul Plata
products.description: Clase Azul is a premium 100% authentic Mexican tequila produced in the Jesus Maria Region of Arandas, Jalisco, Mexico. The product is a collaboration between the Beckmann Family, one of the most powerful families in the Mexican tequila industry, and Arturo Lomeli, a Mexican artist.

products.name: Clase Azul Reposado
products.description: Clase Azul is a premium 100% authentic Mexican tequila produced in the Jesus Maria Region of Arandas, Jalisco, Mexico. The product is a collaboration between the Beckmann Family, one of the most powerful families in the Mexican tequila industry, and Arturo Lomeli, a Mexican artist.

The product is a collaboration between the Beckmann Family, one of the most powerful families in the Mexican tequila industry, and Arturo Lomeli, a Mexican artist.

types.description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings. Traditionally, vodka is made by the distillation of cereal grains or potatoes that have been fermented, though some modern brands use other substances, such as fruits or sugar.

subtypes.description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings. Traditionally, vodka is made by the distillation of cereal grains or potatoes that have been fermented, though some modern brands use other substances, such as fruits or sugar.

products.name: Svedka
products.description: SVEDKA is an award-winning vodka with a pure, clear taste and crisp finish made from the finest spring water and Swedish winter wheat, then distilled five times to remove impurities.

products.name: Svedka Blue Raspberry
products.description: SVEDKA is an award-winning vodka with a pure, clear taste and crisp finish made from the finest spring water and Swedish winter wheat, then distilled five times to remove impurities.

products.name: Svedka Strawberry Lemonade
products.description: SVEDKA is an award-winning vodka with a pure, clear taste and crisp finish made from the finest spring water and Swedish winter wheat, then distilled five times to remove impurities.

products.name: Svedka Pure Infusions Ginger Lime
products.description: SVEDKA is an award-winning vodka with a pure, clear taste and crisp finish made from the finest spring water and Swedish winter wheat, then distilled five times to remove impurities.

products.name: Tito's
products.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka is America's Original Craft Vodka produced in Austin, Texas. It's made in small batches in an old fashioned pot still by Tito Beveridge.

products.name: Smirnoff
products.description: Smirnoff vodka is created by a unique process involving three distillations and ten stages of filtration to deliver smoothness and clarity. Perfect for cocktails and mixed drinks in any occasion.

products.name: Smirnoff Spicy Tamarind
products.description: Smirnoff Spiced is a blend of Smirnoff No. 21 premium vodka with a combination of natural spices and flavors. It is triple distilled from a blend of different grains, and filtered ten times through seven columns of environmentally sustainable charcoal for an exceptionally pure-tasting, smooth spirit.

products.name: New Amsterdam
products.description: New Amsterdam Vodka is a premium, 80 proof vodka made from the finest quality grains. It is five times distilled for unparalleled smoothness, and is filtered three times to create a soft finish.

products.name: New Amsterdam Pineapple
products.description: New Amsterdam Vodka is a premium, 80 proof vodka made from the finest quality grains. It is five times distilled for unparalleled smoothness, and is filtered three times to create a soft finish.

products.name: New Amsterdam Apple
products.description: New Amsterdam Vodka is a premium, 80 proof vodka made from the finest quality grains. It is five times distilled for unparalleled smoothness, and is filtered three times to create a soft finish.

products.name: New Amsterdam Pink Whitney
products.description: New Amsterdam Vodka is a premium, 80 proof vodka made from the finest quality grains. It is five times distilled for unparalleled smoothness, and is filtered three times to create a soft finish.

subtypes.description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings. Traditionally, vodka is made by the distillation of cereal grains or potatoes that have been fermented, though some modern brands use other substances, such as fruits or sugar.

products.name: Ketel One
products.description: Ketel One Vodka is a premium vodka made from 100% non-GMO European wheat. It is distilled in copper pot stills, filtered over loose charcoal, and rests in tile-lined tanks until ready.

products.name: Ketel One Oranje
products.description: Ketel One Oranje flavored vodka begins with Ketel One Vodka, infused with the essence of orange for a crisp, refreshing taste.

products.name: Ketel One Cocktails
products.description: Ketel One Botanical Grapefruit & Rose is fit for those who seek zesty, mouthwatering grapefruit and the elegance of refined rose petals. Each botanical essence is individually and naturally obtained through innovative extraction methods and distillation processes for the freshest, cleanest, most crisp taste possible.

subtypes.description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings. Traditionally, vodka is made by the distillation of cereal grains or potatoes that have been fermented, though some modern brands use other substances, such as fruits or sugar.

products.name: Grey Goose
products.description: Grey Goose is a premium brand vodka produced in France. It was created in the 1990s by Sidney Frank, who sold it to Bacardi in 2004.

products.name: Ciroc
products.description: Ciroc is a brand of vodka produced in France from cold-fermented grapes, distilled five times. The Ciroc brand was founded by Jean-Sébastien Robicquet.

products.name: Absolut Vodka
products.description: Absolut Vodka is a brand of vodka, produced near Åhus, in southern Sweden. Absolut is owned by French group Pernod Ricard; it bought Absolut for €5.63 billion in 2008 from the Swedish state.

products.name: Absolut Lime
products.description: Absolut Lime is made exclusively from natural ingredients, and unlike some other flavored vodkas, it doesn't contain any added sugar. To put it short and simple: Absolut Lime is smooth, rich and very fresh with a distinct note of freshly pressed lime and a slightly sweet and fruity finish.

types.description: Rum is a distilled alcoholic drink made by fermenting then distilling sugarcane molasses or sugarcane juice. The distillate, a clear liquid, is usually aged in oak barrels.

types.description: Wine is an alcoholic drink typically made from fermented grapes. Yeast consumes the sugar in the grapes and converts it to ethanol, carbon dioxide, and heat.

subtypes.description: American wine has been produced for over 300 years. Today, wine production is undertaken in all fifty states, with California producing 89 percent of all US wine.

types.description: Cognac is a variety of brandy named after the town of Cognac, France. It is produced in the surrounding wine-growing region in the departments of Charente and Charente-Maritime.

types.description: Liquor is an alcoholic drink produced by distillation of grains, fruit, or vegetables that have already gone through alcoholic fermentation.

products.name: Jaggermeister
products.description: Jägermeister is a German digestif made with 56 herbs and spices at a strength of 35% alcohol by volume.

products.name: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky
products.description: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky is a Canadian whisky-based liqueur produced by the Sazerac Company. Its foundation is Canadian whisky, and the taste otherwise resembles the candy with a similar name, Ferrara Candy Company's 'Atomic Fireball' candy.

types.description: Aguardiente is a generic term for alcoholic beverages that contain between 29% and 60% alcohol by volume. The word is a compound of the Romance languages words for 'water' and 'burning'.

types.description: Beer is one of the oldest and most widely consumed alcoholic drinks in the world, and the third most popular drink overall after water and tea.

subtypes.description: Domestic beer is beer that is produced in the United States.

products.name: La Rubia
products.description: La Rubia is a light, crisp, and refreshing Pilsner-style lager brewed with the finest barley and hops giving it a sweet and malty taste.

products.name: Bud Light
products.description: Bud Light is brewed using a blend of premium aroma hop varieties, both American-grown and imported, and a combination of barley malts and rice.

subtypes.description: Japanese beer is beer that is produced in Japan.

products.description: Sapporo Premium Beer is a refreshing lager with a crisp, refined flavor and a clean finish.
